resources.string: It is easy. Search jobs based on your skills, qualifications and experience.
Find jobs in your city, near your town or close to your neighborhood.
Do you need to hire employee? Post your available vacancies on our board and find a matching applicant.
Connect with people, check out their resumes and hire them in your company and grow your business.
By using our service, you agree to acknowledge our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
Once you apply for this job, recruiter can see your info such as: address, education, speciality, skills, work history and self introduction. Do you agree?

Shaftoli is an online service that allows members (both workers and employers) to create profiles and connect with each other in an online social network which may represent real-world professional relationships.
